caption:
Today is International Youth Day 2020 – and the theme this year is “Youth Engagement for Global Action”, seeking to highlight the ways in which the engagement of young people at the local, national and global levels is enriching national and multilateral institutions and processes. ✊
.

Lessons can be learned from the youth of today; their representation and engagement in formal institutional politics can make a significant impact – as we’ve seen with @gretathunberg as well as @BLM-Van and many others in recent months. 💕.
.

Bombay's aim is to bring inner and outer beauty together through empowerment initiatives and self-love. Every month we support the ‘I AM A GIRL’  foundation, by giving 5% of all our online purchases to this worthy cause that promotes education, equal rights and child rights. ♀️💟
.

Find out more on our website bombaybrowbar.com.
.
.
.
#InternationalYouthDay2020 #IYD #Youth #BeTheChange #GirlPower #bombaybrowbar #globalaction #iamagirl
